mapper.select: SELECT sso.company_code id, null pid , ssc2.company_level companyLevel, ssc2.company_name_cn name,1 isParent, if(sus.css is not null ,sus.css, 'icon01') iconSkin FROM sfxie_sys_company ssc INNER JOIN sfxie_sys_organization sso ON sso.parent_company_code = ssc.company_code INNER JOIN sfxie_sys_company ssc2 ON ssc2.company_code = sso.company_code LEFT JOIN sfxie_ui_skin sus ON sus.id_ = ssc2.company_code WHERE ssc.create_user = #{createUser} AND ssc.is_valid = 'Y' AND ssc2.company_level = ( SELECT ssu.create_company_level from sfxie_sys_userinfo ssu WHERE ssu.user_id = #{createUser} AND ssu.partition_company = #{partitionCompany} )

SELECT ssc.company_code id, NULL pid, ssc.company_level companyLevel, ssc.company_name_cn NAME, 1 isParent, if(sus.css is not null ,sus.css, 'icon01') iconSkin, NULL partitionCompany FROM sfxie_sys_organization sso INNER JOIN sfxie_sys_company ssc ON ssc.company_code = sso.company_code LEFT JOIN sfxie_ui_skin sus ON sus.id_ = ssc.company_code WHERE sso.parent_company_code = #{parentCompanyCode} AND ssc.company_level = #{parentCompanyLevel}+1 UNION SELECT ssd.department_code id, ssd.company_code pid, 'department' companyLevel, ssd.department_name NAME, 1 isParent, if(sus.css is not null ,sus.css, 'icon01') iconSkin, ssd.partition_company partitionCompany FROM sfxie_sys_department ssd LEFT JOIN sfxie_ui_skin sus ON sus.id_ = ssd.department_code WHERE ssd.company_code = #{parentCompanyCode} AND ssd.partition_company = #{partitionCompany} UNION SELECT ssp.post_code id, ssp.company_code pid, 'post' companyLevel, ssp.post_name NAME, 1 isParent, if(sus.css is not null ,sus.css, 'icon01') iconSkin, ssp.partition_company partitionCompany FROM sfxie_sys_post ssp LEFT JOIN sfxie_ui_skin sus ON sus.id_ = ssp.post_code WHERE ssp.company_code = #{parentCompanyCode} AND ssp.partition_company = #{partitionCompany}

SELECT ssu.user_id userId, ssur.user_name_cn userNameCn, ssur.is_valid isValid, 'company' type FROM sfxie_sys_user_relation ssur INNER JOIN sfxie_sys_userinfo ssu ON ssu.user_id = ssur.user_id WHERE ssur.company_code = #{companyCode} AND ssur.partition_company = #{partitionCompany}
AND ssur.user_name_cn like '%${userNameCn}%'
